ygData.msgSnippet: Well, it s settled then- Xev is the best server. haha!! (Please don t flame me for that!). I d love to hear the adventures of a lvl 18 Iksar necro. I m going
ygData.messageBody:
Well, it's settled then- Xev is the best server.
haha!! (Please don't flame me for that!). I'd love to
hear the adventures of a lvl 18 Iksar necro. I'm going
to head off to Kunark as soon as I hit lvl 19 and
get my teleport spells (druid here). I hear that's
the place to get some good and unique items.
<br><br>I'm hunting in NK right now - which is great as long
as you can keep outta the way of HG and Grif. Plus,
I because it's far from a town, I get a lot of cash
for binding at the gypsie camp and giving sow.
<br><br>Take care- and get more Xev to post here!!<br><br>Xela
